center_panel.button-css: height: 25px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #000; border: 2px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px;
center_panel.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #e4f2f4; color: #05668D; border: 3px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
center_panel.button-pressed-css: font-weight: lighter; background-color: #05668D; color: #E0E0E0; border: none;

settings-css.button-css: height: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #05668D; border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #80CBC4; color: #DEDEDE; border: 3px solid #0b313f; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
settings-css.button-pressed-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #05668D; color: #129ad0; border: none;
settings-css.card-css: text-align: left; border: 3px solid #BDBDBD; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000;

right_panel.chat-text-css: border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #80CBC4; color: #000;
right_panel.user-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 3px solid #81580d; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #e6a836; color: #000;
right_panel.ai-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 100px; background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000;
